short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Xpath extraction extension for ARGOS STU (HTML Action)

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension works in conjunction with the HTML Action operation in ARGOS STU (the automation scenario development software of the ARGOS Low-code platform). It visualizes and facilitates acquisition of Xpath and other various browser related information for development of ARGOS Automation Scenarios.
